pkgmetadata.longdescription: Export Dataframes to 'Vorteks' Software // Export dataframes and automatically start importing into 'Vorteks'. 'Vorteks Visualization Environment (VVE)' and 'Vorteks Data Manager (VDM)' will start an import. 'Vorteks Processing Environment (VPE)' will start a new project and add a file reader with the dataframe file already set. Warning: WINDOWS ONLY. Requires installation of 'Vorteks' software.
